text_logic_form: The height of a triangle is equal to the base of the polygon plus 5.
The area of the triangle is 52.
Find the base of the polygon.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The height of triangle $ACE$ is equal to the base of triangle $ACE$ plus 5.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $CE$, and $AE$, forming a triangle $ACE$.
